header.tagline: Senior Sales Development Expert - SaaS & Tech Solutions

summary: Sales expert with over 8 years of experience in SaaS and tech, with a proven track record of driving $1.2M deals and achieving 120% quota attainment.

bullets.text: Conducted geographical and parameter-based analysis to identify $200K opportunities in LATAM, resulting in a 15% increase in regional sales.
Established and nurtured strategic relationships, enhancing Toshiba's presence in LATAM and contributing to a 20% increase in market share.
Led a team of 3 BDRs, improving prospecting efficiency and pipeline growth by 30%, resulting in a 25% increase in qualified leads.
Initiated and qualified $1.2M deal with a U.S. rental car company through strategic outbound prospecting.
Achieved quota attainment over 5 quarters by optimizing lead flows and sales outreach sequences.
Led SDR team to open 50 new opportunities for AEs in under six months.
Sourced and secured an $880K deal with a U.S. stadium, surpassing expectations.
Achieved 98% average quota across team by refining cold call and digital engagement processes.
Collaborated with teams to develop successful call scripts and lead criteria.
Prepared comprehensive reports to support bids and client initiatives, facilitating strategic decisions.
Participated in digital and in-person marketing initiatives, achieving 120% of quota and a President’s Club award.
Led SDR teams consistently achieving 95-105% quota in the U.S. market.
